str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To groan, expressing grief, anger, or desire. From stenos; to make in straits, i.e. to sigh, murmur, pray inaudibly.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From epi and potheo; to dote upon, i.e. Intensely crave possession.
To have on over (as a garment); mid: I put on myself in addition. Middle voice from epi and enduo; to invest upon oneself.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
A dwelling-place, habitation, abode. Neuter of a presumed derivative of oikeo; a residence.
